dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, have you seen these numbers?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, have you seen these numbers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Kazakhstan, like, over half women! 51.1%? Wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Kazakhstan, like, over half women! fifty one point one percent? Wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the bureau, the share of women in the population of Kazakhstan is 51.1%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild! Ten million, three hundred eighty-one thousand, three hundred seventy-seven women, specifically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild! Ten million, three hundred eighty-one thousand, three hundred seventy-seven women, specifically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The number of women in Kazakhstan is 10,381,377 people, which is 51.1% of the total population of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And up 15.2% in ten years, like that’s a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And up fifteen point two percent in ten years, like that's a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the past ten years, the number of women has increased by 15.2%," the report says.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a huge jump. And, um, mostly in cities too, 64.4% urban.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a huge jump. And, um, mostly in cities too, sixty four point four percent urban.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that 64.4% of women live in cities and 35.6% in rural areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally. Almaty's crushing it with 1.2 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally. Almaty's crushing it with one point two million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The leader among the regions in terms of the number of women is Almaty, where 1.2 million women live.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But Astana! Uh, 82.1% increase? That's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But Astana! Uh, eighty two point one percent increase? That's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the past ten years, the highest increase in the number of women is observed in the capital - by 82.1%.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Insane! And the average age, 34.1. So young!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Insane! And the average age, thirty four point one. So young!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The average age of the female population of Kazakhstan is 34.1 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So young! And 4.4 million of them are working, uh, mostly in education, trade, healthcare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So young! And four point four million of them are working, uh, mostly in education, trade, healthcare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, 4.4 million women work in various fields, the majority in education, trade, and healthcare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Like, Tokayev even said their labor is behind so many achievements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Like, Tokayev even said their labor is behind so many achievements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev on women's role: Their labor is behind many of Kazakhstan™s achievements

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh, absolutely! It’s, like, proof right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh, absolutely! It's, like, proof right there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's all there in the numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all there in the numbers.
